jml.random
Class WeightedNumberGenerator

java.lang.Object
  jml.random.NumberGenerator
      jml.random.WeightedNumberGenerator

public class WeightedNumberGenerator
extends NumberGenerator

Title: WeightedNumberGenerator

Description: This class is a random number generator, that generates the numbers according to the probabilities given.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Universidad Nacional de Colombia

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jonatan Gomez

Field Summary
(package private)  double[] object
          The numbers that the object can generate
(package private)  double[] weight
          The probabilities assigned to each number that the object can generate

g
 
Constructor Summary
WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1)
          Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of natural numbers in the interval [0,n-1] according to the probabilities given.
WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1, double[] object1)
          Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of the given numbers according to the probabilities given.
WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1, int[] object1)
          Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of the given numbers according to the probabilities given.

Constructor Detail

WeightedNumberGenerator

public WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1)
Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of natural numbers in the interval [0,n-1] according to the probabilities given. Here n is the dimension of the probabilities array.

Parameters:
weight1 - The probabilies of generation of each number

WeightedNumberGenerator

public WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1,
                               double[] object1)
Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of the given numbers according to the probabilities given.

Parameters:
weight1 - The probabilies of generation of each number
object1 - The numbers that the object can generate

WeightedNumberGenerator

public WeightedNumberGenerator(double[] weight1,
                               int[] object1)
Constructor: Creates a weighted number generator of the given numbers according to the probabilities given.

Parameters:
weight1 - The probabilies of generation of each number
object1 - The numbers that the object can generate
Method Detail

setWeights

public void setWeights(double[] weight1)
Set the numbers probabilities

Parameters:
weight1 - The probabilies of generation of each number

normalize

public void normalize()
Normalizes the weight array in that way that the sum of weights is equal to 1.0. This method is not called in constructors.

newInt

public int newInt()
Returns a random integer number. This method returns the integer value of the real returned by the newDouble method

newBoolean

public boolean newBoolean()
Returns a random boolean value. If the integer returned by the method new integer is odd this method return true. If is even return false

Specified by:
newBoolean in class NumberGenerator
Returns:
A random boolean value
